Weekly-ish Roundup #1

This used to be called Weekly Roundup #1 but I didn't want to commit to a regular posting schedule ðŸ˜…

I'll use Weekly-ish Roundup to dump recommendations, opinions, and reviews around things I like. Think: Cool Tools but more amateur. And without regularly scheduled content. And much, much more infrequent.

Stuff I built

Interactively search (and checkout) Git branches with Peco

https://github.com/peco/peco

I used to be a devout, terminal-only elitist. My entire development workflow was driven by CLIs and Neovim. Last year I finally bit the bullet and gave VS Code a shot (thanks to a friend who pointed me toward VSCode Neovim).

Using VS Code for source control and GitHub stuff has made me realize nice GUIs can be but there are still a couple things I still prefer to do via the command line.

function igco {
  git checkout $(git branch | peco)
}
